description: A fortified acropolis known as Kastro Rogon and located near modern Nea Karasounta in Epirus, Greece has been identified as the likely site of ancient Bouchetion, a colony of Elis.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap. Dates after BAtlas.
